title: BlitzWars
description:
// this is the original game - and I will keep seeding as long and fast as possible//

BlitzWars Free is a modern warfare strategy game, not much unlike known turn based board games Ã¢â‚¬â€œ only with way better animations and bigger explosions.

You'll be playing against 2-7 computer opponents on countless maps from small to extremely huge. Starting with 2 or 3 Territories and a few units, your goal is to expand and conquer every other territory. Just until you are the only one left!

* countless maps
* every battle unique
* up to 7 enemies
* detailed graphics and animations
* intelligent opponents (from easy to invincible)
* no in-game billing
* no hidden costs
* no collection of your private data
* only tanks, soldiers and big explosions

From small skirmishes to epic battles Ã¢â‚¬â€œ is suitable for every occasion.
